Guys just do the world a favor and stop pirating minecraft it is so cheap to just go out and buy a copy of it. Offline servers are fuckin stupid, I bought  copy of minecraft and been lovin it ever since. If you love minecraft then support the makers and buy it!
Support Minecraft! Buy it!

Offline/Cracked servers are the same, the only difference is they have there own authentication system, so they tend to have a few more security plugins. Other then that, they are no different.

People like deus223 don't understand how Mojang (creates of Minecraft) makes money from piracy and support p2p.

There are a lot of people who would have never even looked at the game let a lone buy it, I was one of toughs people but just like any other good game, I got hooked on it and joined a server. With in a few months of playing on that server I bought the game and got a Minecraft skin. Today I own the biggest cracked Minecraft server in the world and you would be suprised to know how many of my players buy the game but you can always listen to idiots like deus223 and then Mojang and you miss out.

Support Mojang, Support ThePirateBay and support freedom!

Thanks again TE!
